data.name: Moonbeam
data.description:
## What Is Moonbeam (GLMR)?

Moonbeam is a smart-contract blockchain on Polkadot that strives to provide compatibility with the existing Ethereum developer toolchain and network. 

To learn more about this project, check out our deep dive of [Moonbeam](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-moonbeam-glmr).

It does this by providing a full EVM implementation, a Web3-compatible API, and bridges that connect Moonbeam to existing Ethereum networks. 

This allows developers to deploy existing Solidity smart contracts and DApp frontends to Moonbeam with minimal changes.


## What is Glimmer (GLMR)?
As a decentralized smart contract platform, Moonbeam requires a utility token to function.
Glimmer is central to the design of Moonbeam and cannot be removed without sacrificing essential functionality. 
The Moonbeam token uses include:

* Supporting the gas metering of smart contract execution
* Incentivizing collators and powering the mechanics around the creation of a decentralized node infrastructure on which the platform can run
* Facilitating the on-chain governance mechanism, including proposing referenda, electing council members, voting, etc.
* Paying for network transaction fees


Moonbeam tools and integrations include:

* Ethereum developer tools such as Metamask, Remix IDE, web3.js, Ethers.js, Truffle and other toolkits such as Polkadot.js apps 
* Oracle integrations such as Chainlink, Band Protocol, Razor, and DIA Protocol 
* API & Infrastructure integrations: Onfinality, Covalent
* Wallets: Mathwallet, Polkadot.js, Metamask, AirGap
* Partnerships with other Polkadot chains: Acala, Polkadot’s relay chain, Equilibrium, Kilt, Phala, Crust
* Bridges: Chainbridge, Ren*, Interlay*, Snowfork*, Axelar*
* Block explorers - Subscan, Polkadot.js, Blockscout* 
* DeFi Protocols: Balancer, SushiSwap, Offshift, IDEX, Linear Finance, Injective Protocol
* Assets & Issuance Partners: Ocean Protocol, AllianceBlock, AMPnet, Poolz, Polkastarter and Kilt
* DApps: Human Protocol, Polkacover, BePro

## What are the tokenomics of Glimmer?
There will be a total supply of 10 million GLMR tokens once the Moonbeam Network launches with a yearly inflation rate of 5%. A more detailed summary of the allocation of Glimmer tokens can be found here: https://moonbeam.foundation/glimmer-token/
 

## When will GLMR be available for purchase?
There will be a public sale for Glimmer in Q3 2021, followed by an exchange listing.
